ValueDomain.preferredName: Clinical Data Update System Dose Modification Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A system to standardize and streamline data reporting and reduce administration needs.  This system achieves rapid, accurate, and secure capture of clinical trial data with minimal effort. Successfully captures the majority of trial data within hours of submission. RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Clinical Data Update System Dose Modification Code
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system to standardize and streamline data reporting and reduce administration needs.  This system achieves rapid, accurate, and secure capture of clinical trial data with minimal effort. Successfully captures the majority of trial data within hours of submission. (Bypass Budget 2001 & 2002):Change, alteration, or adjustment of a dose specified in a treatment plan or/and administered to a patient.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
